detectors.description:
balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Token__32.sol#10)
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Token__32.sol#125-127)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Token__32.sol#185-187)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Token__32.sol#11)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Token__32.sol#12)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Token__32.sol#134-146)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Token__32.sol#152-156)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Token__32.sol#13)
